Token.Abstract: ACLIPMoviePlayerViewController is used for all playback of videos from Aclipsa.
Initialize an ACLIPMoviePlayerViewController for the video

Parameter.Name: video
Parameter.Abstract: The ACLIPVideo that is to be loaded into the media player for playback.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A movie player controller configured for the video.

Token.Abstract: Initialize an ACLIPMoviePlayerViewController for the video

Parameter.Name: video
Parameter.Abstract: The ACLIPVideo that is to be loaded into the media player for playback.

Parameter.Name: withAutoScaling
Parameter.Abstract: BOOL indicating whether or not the video should be automatically scaled by the player

ReturnValue.Abstract: A movie player controller configured for the video.

Token.Abstract: Initialize an ACLIPMoviePlayerViewController for the message (supports screenshot reporting)

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The ACLIPMessage containing the video that is to be loaded into the media player for playback.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A movie player controller configured for the video. Returns nil if screenshot reporting is enabled but camera roll access is denied

Token.Abstract: Initialize an ACLIPMoviePlayerViewController for the message (supports screenshot reporting)

Parameter.Name: message
Parameter.Abstract: The ACLIPMessage containing the video that is to be loaded into the media player for playback.

Parameter.Name: withAutoScaling
Parameter.Abstract: BOOL indicating whether or not the video should be automatically scaled by the player

ReturnValue.Abstract: A movie player controller configured for the video. Returns nil if screenshot reporting is enabled but camera roll access is denied
